document_data.name: Dargentum
document_data.mainbody: '''Dargentum the Darksteel Drake''' was a [[silver dragon|silver]] [[great wyrm]] who resided in the abandoned realm of [[Clan Ironstar]] inside [[Firstpeak]], above the [[River Surbrin]].
